message: I was looking for a way in which I could use the same asynchronous method which loads data from an external source when the View first loads (i.e in the VM constructor) and via a Refresh button. NotifyTaskCompletion fits the first case and AsyncCommand the second. At the moment I use the latter and just call the Execute method of the command in the constructor. Probably not the best but it seems to work. I am using the AsyncEx version of NotifyTaskCompletion and had to make minor modifications to your AsyncCommand in the articles. Occasionally it appears that Execution.TaskCompleted is null
